translations.home.intro.paragraph1: Our platform gives a real-time view of the immediate needs of healthcare workers. We provide this information to the organizations of paid workers and volunteers that are ready and able to help.
translations.home.intro.paragraph2: Want to know more about who we’re working with, or have supplies or services you want to donate?
translations.home.intro.title: You need support and supplies to keep fighting the coronavirus. We help you communicate your needs to people who can help.
translations.home.needServices.description: Support for myself so I can keep working
translations.home.needServices.title: Need services
translations.home.needSupplies.description: Items for use in the facility where I work
translations.home.needSupplies.title: Need supplies
translations.request.dropSiteForm.description: This is where donors can drop off supplies. It should be an easily identifiable location including a street address.
translations.request.dropSiteForm.dropSiteName.label: Name
translations.request.dropSiteForm.dropSiteNotes.label: Is there anything else you’d like others to know about the situation at your facility?
translations.request.dropSiteForm.dropSitePhone.label: Email or phone number
translations.request.dropSiteForm.dropSiteRequirement: All donated items must be unused and sealed in original packaging.
translations.request.dropSiteForm.moreInfo.descriptio: We’re also working to solve this problem at scale. Can you give us the name and contact info of the person at your facility responsible for procuring supplies?
translations.request.dropSiteForm.moreInfo.title: More info (optional)
translations.request.dropSiteForm.requestWillingToPay: My facility will pay for large volumes of high-quality supplies.
translations.request.dropSiteForm.requirements.descri: Please enter any requirements about how supplies should be delivered.,
translations.request.dropSiteForm.requirements.title: Add requirements (optional)
translations.request.dropSiteForm.title: Set a drop-off location
translations.request.facilityAdded.title: We added your facility
translations.request.facilityForm.dropSiteZip.label: Zip code
translations.request.facilityForm.dropSiteCity.label: City
translations.request.facilityForm.dropSiteState.label: State
translations.request.facilityForm.dropSiteUrl.label: Website URL (optional)
translations.request.facilityForm.title: Add a new facility
translations.request.facilityForm.description: Enter some information about your facility.
translations.request.facilityForm.emailAt: If you’re working from a temporary facility, email us at
translations.request.facilitySearch.description: I'm a healthcare professional working at:
translations.request.facilitySearch.search.label: City or healthcare facility
translations.request.facilitySearch.title: Find your healthcare facility
translations.request.supplyForm.description: You’ll be able to add more requests after submitting this first one.
Include any detailed requirements about the supplies you need.
i.e.: All donated items must be unused and sealed in original packaging.
translations.request.supplyForm.disclaimer: Note: By submitting this request you acknowledge that Help Supply assumes no liability for any supplies delivered by donors.
translations.request.supplyForm.kind.label: Select kind
translations.request.supplyForm.quantity.label: Quantity
translations.request.supplyForm.title: What supplies do you need most?
translations.request.supplyForm.type.label: Select type
translations.request.supplyForm.facilityWillPayLargeV: My facility will pay for large volumes of high-quality supplies.
translations.request.workEmailForm.description: We need to verify your email before you request supplies.
translations.request.workEmailForm.sent.title: Thank you
translations.request.workEmailForm.sent.description: We just sent you an email with a link to verify your email. It should arrive within a couple minutes.
translations.request.workEmailForm.title: Enter your work email address
translations.request.workEmailForm.workEmail.disclaim: Note: we will never share your email address with any other parties.
translations.request.dropSiteContactForm.title: Contact info
translations.request.dropSiteContactForm.description: Enter the contact information for the person coordinating supplies at your facility.
translations.request.dropSiteContactForm.name.label: Name
translations.request.dropSiteContactForm.sent.title: We added the facility contact info
